arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
footnotes: Washirikina walisema: Mashetani ndio wanamsomea Qur'ani Muhammad. Qur'ani ikawajibu: Nikupeni khabari watu gani Mashetani ndio wanawateremkia, na wakawashawishi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
